subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Blair Walsh led the N.F.L. in field goals this season, but he has never kicked in a game in which the temperature fell below 40 degrees, and the forecast for Green Bay this Saturday calls for a high of 26.
snippet: Blair Walsh led the N.F.L. in field goals this season, but he has never kicked in a game in which the temperature fell below 40 degrees, and the forecast for Green Bay this Saturday calls for a high of 26.
